button_private_login_key: ICH HABE MEINEN PRIVATEN LOGIN-KEY AUFGESCHRIEBEN; EINLOGGEN
qr_code_text: Der QR-Code hilft Ihnen dabei, Zahlungen schnell zu erhalten. Sie müssen keine E-Mail verschicken oder Ihre Lozzax-Adresse eingeben, wenn jemand Ihnen Geldmittel überweist. Sie können ganz einfach Ihren QR-Code einscannen, indem Sie eine Lozzax-Applikation verwenden, die dieses System unterstützt.
review_private_login_key: Überprüfen Sie hier Ihren privaten Login-Key:
description_what_xmrwallet_text: Lozzax ist eine quelloffene Kryptowährung, die im April 2014 erschaffen wurde und ihren Fokus auf Datenschutz und Dezentralisierung hat. Lozzax wallet bietet eine quelloffene Web-Umgebung für Ihr Lozzax-Wallet. Nathalie Roy erschuf Lozzax wallet, um die Nutzung von Lozzax möglich zu machen, ohne dass es dafür notwendig sein würde, eine Software herunterzuladen oder zu übersetzen. Die Nutzung von Lozzax wallet wird immer völlig kostenlos sein und sich ausschließlich auf Spenden stützen.
description_what_hosted_1: Die App ist zu 100% kundenorientiert und quelloffen
description_what_hosted_3: Gänzlich kostenlos, einschließlich des Imports von vorangegangenen Transaktionen
description_risk_xmrwallet: Risiko im Rahmen der Nutzung von Lozzax wallet
description_risk_xmrwallet_text: Lozzax wallet ist eine webbasierte Benutzeroberfläche. Sie hilft Ihnen dabei, Lozzax zu nutzen, ohne einen kompletten Lozzax-Netzknoten in Betrieb zu haben. Lozzax wallet für große Beträge zu nutzen kann Sie einem beträchtlichen Risiko aussetzen. Wir empfehlen Ihnen, Lozzax wallet wie Ihre eigentliche Brieftasche zu behandeln. Versuchen Sie, keine großen Geldbeträge in ihm aufzubewahren. Wenn Sie Lozzax für eine langfristige Einlage nutzen möchten, dann empfehlen wir Ihnen, ein Konto zu erstellen, Ihren privaten Key an einem sicheren Ort aufzubewahren und es nur ein einziges Mal zu verwenden.
description_must_xmrwallet: Sie müssen Ihren privaten Login-Key speichern.
description_must_xmrwallet_text: Oberhalb dieser Informationen werden Sie Ihren "privaten Login-Key" aus dreizehn Worten finden. Sie müssen diesen sicher und privat aufbewahren. Bedenken Sie, dass dies für Sie äußerst wichtig ist. Dies stellt für Sie die einzige Möglichkeit dar, sich in Ihr Lozzax-Konto einzuloggen. Wir können Ihren "privaten Login-Key" nicht auf dem Server speichern und wenn Sie ihn verlieren, werden wir nicht in der Lage sein, ihn wiederherzustellen. Sie können Ihren "privaten Login-Key" nicht ändern. Wenn dieser gestohlen werden sollte, müssen Sie Ihre Geldmittel mit einem neuen "privaten Login-Key" auf ein anderes Konto überweisen. Die beste Möglichkeit, um Ihren "privaten Login-Key" zu sichern, besteht darin, ihn auf ein Blatt Papier zu schreiben, dieses zu laminieren und es an einem sicheren Ort aufzubewahren.
landing_header_subitle: Lozzax durch die Nutzung von lozzax.xyz sofort verschicken und erhalten
landing_description_security_text: Lozzax ist ein sicheres digitales Zahlungsmittel, das von einem Netzwerk von Nutzern betrieben wird. Lozzax ist außerdem eine dezentralisierte Kryptowährung. Alle Transaktionen werden über einen verteilten Konsens bestätigt und daraufhin unabänderlich in der Blockchain aufgezeichnet. Sie dürfen bei der Sicherung Ihrer Lozzax nicht auf Drittparteien vertrauen.
landing_description_nobody_text: Lozzax verschleiert die Adresse des Empfängers und des Absenders sowie alle überwiesenen Beträge, sodass niemand die Lozzax-Blockchain mit einem speziellen Nutzer in Verbindung bringen oder in der realen Welt einen Identitätsabgleich vornehmen kann.
landing_description_privacy_text: Um die Ziele, Ursprünge und Beträge aller Transaktionen zu verschleiern, nutzt Lozzax Stealth-Adressen, Ring Confidential Transactions und Ring Signatures. Alle Vorteile einer dezentralisierten Kryptowährung werden von Lozzax ohne jedwede (sonst so typische) Konzessionen bezüglich des Datenschutzes angeboten.
landing_description_changeable_text: Lozzax ist veränderlich, da es automatisch privat ist. Verkäufer können Lozzax nicht auf die schwarze Liste setzen oder umtauschen, da diese mit vorangegangenen Transaktionen zusammenhängen.
policy_h4_1_1: If you use our websites, mobile applications of our company, or when you interact with our company in any other way, you should learn how we collect information, use it and disclose it.
policy_h4_1_2: From time to time we add, some new information or change some rules. That's why you should review the date at the top of the policy and look through the statement on our blog. Be sure way will send you messages about changes on your mail.

policy_h4_2_1: First of all is, the information you give us directly. Such as, the date when you create an account, about your participation in any other interactive actions of our services, to fill this or that form; what transactions did you complete with the help of Lozzax wallet, if you asked about customer support if you communicated with us lately. The information we ask for includes your e-mail address, m-address, open allies aliases, password, mobile phone number, mobile PIN code and any other you would like to give us. Automatically is collected information about your use of the service, the type of browser you use, access times, pages viewed, your IP address and those pages which you looked through before connecting with us.
policy_h4_2_2: Information about device: about the mobile device you use when connecting with our mobile application, including hardware telephones, operating system and version, unique device identifiers and mobile network information.
policy_h4_2_3: Sometimes we send small data files stored on your hard drive or in device memory. They are called cookies. If helps us to improve our services and give you more experience.
policy_h4_2_4: So we can control what services are popular and count contacts and visits if you disable cookies, you will break the session function which is required by the hosted account service of Lozzax wallet.

terms_h4_4_1: We will describe our services in details below our services provides in brow they software and it generates and stores a Lozzax wallet account address and a private key, they make easier requests to the Lozzax wallet network without requiring install the associated Lozzax wallet client software, and requiring you to personally download.
terms_h4_4_2: Your account address and your personal private key. If you create an account, our services provide you a pair of cryptographic private and public keys which you can use while sending and receiving through the Lozzax wallet network. This view key of your account is stored by the service which enables it to determine any transactions concerning to you account. The services do not know or store your private key. What means that it is cryptographically impossible for our company to spend founds on your behalf. The combined public key generated by our services is your Lozzax wallet account address and it is used to create transaction and may be shared with Lozzax wallet network and with others to complete Lozzax wallet transaction and to send Lozzax wallet from that account address. You have your personal responsibility for security of your private key and your private login key. it is uniquely matches the account address and must be used in connection with the account address to make transactions to send Lozzax wallet from that account address. Be attentive! You must remember that any one that has access to your private login key or private key pair will be able to spend or to transfer the Lozzax wallet.
terms_h4_4_3: You cannot retrieve your private login key our company does not receive on stare your account private login key nor the unencrypted private spend key. We cannot help you to retrieve your account private login key. Our services provide you with tools to reveal your own private login key when it logged in, wonder to facilitate backups by you, but we cannot generated a new private login key for your account. You only you responsible and must remember your account private login key. If you have forgotten any account addresses and private login key or private view or spend key pairs maintained in your account, any Lozzax wallet you have associated with these account addresses will become inaccessible if you do not remember your account login key.
terms_h4_4_4: Requests for transactions all proposed Lozzax wallet transactions are confirmed and recorded in the Lozzax wallet public ledger through verification network which is distributed consensus Lozzax wallet network. It is not our ownership. We do not control it. Our services only help you to submit your Lozzax wallet transaction request for conformation to the verification network. These networks are operated by decentralized network as an independent third panther.
terms_h4_4_5: We do not control the Lozzax wallet network and verification network and we cannot guarantee that every transaction request you make through the services will be confirmed through verification network. Some of them will not be completed or even maybe delayed by verification network. If you complete a transaction request through the services you authorize our company to submit your request about transaction to the network according with the instructions you provide through the services.
terms_h4_4_6: Do not store or transmit Lozzax wallet. Lozzax wallet exists only by virtue of the ownership records maintained in the Lozzax wallet network. Our services do not store, send or receive Lozzax wallet. Any transfer occurs within the decentralized Lozzax wallet network but not within the services.
terms_h4_4_7: Our relationship with you means that our company is an independent contractor for all operations, but not your agent or trustee.
terms_h4_4_8: Be accurate with information you must guarantee that all information you provide for our services is complete and accurate. Company is not responsible for your errors or omissions while you use our Lozzax wallet services. If you mistype an account address or provide incorrect information in any transaction request the Lozzax wallet will be sent to whatever account address or information you give. be careful before completing any transaction request through the send.
terms_h4_4_9: You cannot correct your mistakes to cancelation or modification your message. If you have send your transaction on request to the Lozzax wallet verification network through the services, your request will be automatically completed or rejected and you will not be able to cancel or modify your transaction request. We have no control over the Lozzax wallet verification network and we cannot correct or modification your request. All request are irreversible.
terms_h4_4_10: Taxes. You are responsible for determining what taxes are applied to the transactions which you complete through the services. You must report and remit the correct tax to the appropriate tax authority. Our company cannot determinate whether taxes apply to your Lozzax wallet transactions. We cannot collect, with hold, remit or collect any taxes asking from Lozzax wallet transactions.
terms_h4_5_1: Though the access to the account is free, our company can change fees for some additional services. Company an charge a fee for practically every transaction. the sum of fees will be displayed while you use this or that service.
terms_h4_5_3: Lozzax wallet network software is installed in the Lozzax wallet verification network. The computers of our customers use it. So they are called "miners" and voluntary participate in confirmation process of verification network. Lozzax wallet mining overview. Lozzax wallet network software is installed in the Lozzax wallet verification network and you computers are operated by it. The persons who operate such computers are called "mines", they voluntary participate in the verification network confirmation process Lozzax wallet "mines" make a list of further Lozzax wallet transactions, called "blocks" as reward which are generated automatically through the Lozzax wallet network any fees which are voluntary included into block by the persons who initiated the proposed transactions(miners fees) if miners verify Lozzax wallet transactions on a voluatary basis if is necessary to add miners fees to have an opportunity to provide an incentive to the miners to add a suggested transaction to the next block for confirmation on through the verification network.
terms_h4_5_5: Miners fees are not allowed to modify by our services at this stage. They are calculated on the base of the expected minimum fee for any transaction, which is calculated on per-kilobyte size of the physical data size of the transaction, which is not related to the amount of Lozzax wallet which will be transferred. You must know and agree with the fact that company does not receive any miners fees though it provides the services. We are not responsible for the speed with what your transactions may be verified by miners.
